about_the_game:
In the world of A Shadow of Time, players will embark on an unforgettable journey of self-discovery and exploration. The game is a stunningly beautiful third person exploration game that invites players to immerse themselves in breathtaking landscapes and uncover hidden secrets.

As players explore this vast and mystical world, they will be guided by a mysterious voice that shares personal stories about moments in their life when time stopped. These stories allow players to make sense of the world around them, as they seek to restore life and time to the world.

At its core, A Shadow of Time is a game about exploration, and players will be able to traverse this vast world at their own pace. As they journey through lush forests and snowy mountains, they will uncover hidden secrets and solve intricate puzzles.
